GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.19 to before v5.0
GSD.description:
netlabel: fix out-of-bounds memory accesses

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.0 by commit 5578de4834fe0f2a34fedc7374be691443396d1f, it was introduced in version v2.6.19 by commit 446fda4f26822b2d42ab3396aafcedf38a9ff2b6. For more details please see the references link.
